title: Describe a bad experience at the hair salon.

korean: 대학생 때 처음으로 염색했다가 완전 망한 적 있어요.
친구들 따라서 홍대 근처 유명하다는 미용실 갔거든요.
애쉬 브라운으로 해달라고 했는데 거의 주황색이 나온 거예요.
디자이너분한테 말했더니 원래 이렇게 나온다고 하시더라고요.
근데 사진이랑 완전 다른데 그냥 넘어가려고 하시는 거예요.
너무 황당하고 화가 났지만 어떻게 해야 할지 몰라서.
집에 와서 거울 보는데 진짜 눈물 날 뻔했어요.
결국 다음 날 다른 미용실 가서 다시 염색했죠.
그때 이후로는 리뷰 꼼꼼히 보고 신중하게 미용실 선택해요.
english: When I was in college, I dyed my hair for the first time and it totally failed.
I went to this famous salon near Hongdae following my friends.
I showed them a picture and asked them to do it like that.
But the result was completely different.
I asked for ash brown, but it came out almost orange.
When I told the designer, they said it originally comes out like this.
But it was completely different from the photo, and they just tried to brush it off.
I was so flustered and angry, but I didn't know what to do.
So I just paid and left.
When I came home and looked in the mirror, I almost cried.
In the end, I went to another salon the next day and dyed it again.
Since then, I carefully read reviews and choose salons carefully, you know.
